paper_title: Deep learning accelerated phase prediction of refractory multi-principal element alloys

claims.claim: The trained MLP achieves an exact-match accuracy of 0.90 on the testing dataset, correctly predicting the complete set of coexisting phases among eight possible phases
instruction: The notebook loads the trained MLP model and the testing dataset, computing the exact-match (subset) accuracy defined based on the fraction of test samples for which the predicted phase-presence vector exactly matches the ground truth
Verify that the reported exact-match accuracy is approximately 0.90 (within Â±0.05)
